group_1.narration: In order to amaze Chisato, I visited Magical Girls@who specialize in various disciplines@in order to improve my own abilities.
Having mastered the art of the staff meal,@my next person of interest was a professional artist.

group_1.textLeft: So you want to meet a professional artist…
There's Alina… But her whereabouts are@unknown, so we'll have to rule her out.

group_1.textRight: …Then I suppose that leaves us with@only one option.

group_1.textLeft: Well…I can't think of anyone else.

group_1.textRight: I'm rather nervous about this…

group_1.textLeft: She's in her school's art club and likes@shoujo manga.

group_1.textRight: I heard she's good at drawing.

group_1.textLeft: She's caused quite a bit of trouble as@a Magical Girl.
But…she's a kind and honest girl at heart.

group_1.textRight: Why did you say it like that…?

group_1.narration: …With that unsettling introduction,@I went to the meeting place.@There, I met a girl who appeared@to be younger than me.

group_1.textRight: Oh! Are you Takina?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, and that would make you…?

group_1.textRight: The professional artist you're looking for!
…My senpai would kill me if she heard me@saying that, but still.
Anyway, the name's Karin Misono!@Pleased to meet you!

group_1.textLeft: I am Takina Inoue.@It's a pleasure to meet you.

group_1.textRight: Let's get right to it.@You wanna get better at drawing, Takina?

group_1.textLeft: Yes… I hate to admit it, but people laughed@at my portrait.
I didn't think it was that bad…

group_1.textRight: How awful!
It hurts me too when Alina calls my drawings@"spazzatura."
To a genius artist, it is…
But everyone else says it's good!
The fact that I'm the go-to for this means@as much!
So if you wanna know the secrets of portrait@drawing, look no further than Master Karin!
Oh, no, I was just kidding!@Just call me Karin!
[chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]But still… "Master"...@*Giggle*
And I have a disciple too…@*Giggle*
Alright, as soon as I get my sketchbook out,@your training begins!
First things first, when you're making a portrait,@you need to look at the face carefully!

group_1.textLeft: I need to take a careful look…

group_1.textRight: D-don't get so close!@It's embarrassing!

group_1.textLeft: But you told me to look carefully.

group_1.textRight: Not like that!@You follow instructions way too literally!
Erm… Oh yeah! And you have to understand@the subject's characteristics!
For example!
There's a manga series that I call my Bible!
It's called Phantom Thief Magical Kirin.
You wanna know more?!

group_1.textLeft: Erm, ah… If it will teach me, sure.
